info.title: FUSE Varsity Backend API
info.description: API documentation for FUSE Varsity Backend application

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: 'Bearer {token}'

get.description: Returns a welcome message for the API

post.description: Change password for authenticated user

401.description: Unauthorized: No token provided or invalid token

post.description: Request password reset email
Login user with email and password
Logout current user

401.description: Unauthorized: No token provided or invalid token

post.description: Reset password with token
Create a new assessment (quiz or assignment) for a topic. Facilitator access required.

topic_id.description: ID of the topic this assessment belongs to

time_limit.description: Time limit in minutes for quiz (optional)

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific assessment by ID. Available to both students and facilitators.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: ID of the assessment to retrieve

put.description: Update an existing assessment. Facilitator access required and must own the course.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: ID of the assessment to update

403.description: Forbidden - Facilitator access required or not course owner

delete.description: Delete an assessment and all associated submissions. Facilitator access required and must own the course.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: ID of the assessment to delete

403.description: Forbidden - Facilitator access required or not course owner

post.description: Submit answers for a quiz or assignment. Students only.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: ID of the assessment to submit

answers.description: Array of answers for quiz questions or assignment submission

submission_text.description: Text submission for assignment type assessments

400.description: Validation error or submission not allowed

403.description: Forbidden - Maximum attempts exceeded or not enrolled

get.description: Retrieve all assessments for a specific topic. Available to both students and facilitators.

parameters.name: topicId
parameters.description: ID of the topic to get assessments for

completed.description: Whether user has submitted this assessment

attempts_made.description: Number of attempts made by user

can_attempt.description: Whether user can make another attempt

post.description: Create a new course. Only facilitators can create courses.

description.example: Learn the fundamentals of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

total_topics.description: Total number of topics in the course

get.description: Retrieve all courses created by the authenticated facilitator with optional pagination.
Retrieve details of a specific course by ID. Only facilitators can access their own courses.

403.description: Forbidden - Facilitator role required or not course owner

put.description: Update all fields of a course. Only the course owner can update their course.

description.example: Updated course description with more details

patch.description: Update specific fields of a course. Only the course owner can update their course.

delete.description: Delete a course and all its associated topics. Only the course owner can delete their course.

post.description: Create a new topic for a course. Only the course owner can create topics.

content.example: In this topic, we'll learn about variables and how to use them in programming.

get.summary: Get all topics for a course
get.description: Retrieve all topics for a specific course with optional pagination.
Retrieve details of a specific topic by ID. Only the course owner can access topics.

put.description: Update all fields of a topic. Only the course owner can update topics.

content.example: Updated topic content with more comprehensive information.

patch.description: Update specific fields of a topic. Only the course owner can update topics.

delete.description: Delete a topic from a course. Only the course owner can delete topics.

post.description: Mark a topic as completed. Automatically validates if all required assessments are completed and passed before allowing completion.

parameters.name: topicId
parameters.description: ID of the topic to mark as complete

400.description: Bad request - Topic already completed or assessments not passed

403.description: Forbidden - User not enrolled in course

get.description: Retrieves the user's complete CV data in the template format including personal info, experience, education, skills, projects, awards, certifications, and languages.

post.description: Creates a new CV or updates an existing CV with complete data including personal info, experience, education, skills, projects, awards, certifications, and languages.

summary.example: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development.

403.description: Forbidden - Must complete at least one course

delete.description: Deletes the user's CV profile and all related data including experience, education, skills, projects, awards, certifications, and languages.

post.description: Adds a new award to the user's CV profile.

description.example: First place in national coding competition

post.description: Adds a new certification to the user's CV profile.

get.summary: Get completed courses for CV reference
get.description: Retrieves all courses completed by the user that can be referenced in their CV.

description.example: Complete course on modern web development

post.description: Adds a new language to the user's CV profile.

400.description: Bad request - Missing required fields or invalid level

post.description: Adds a new project to the user's CV profile.

description.example: Modular service for catalog, cart, and checkout.

post.description: Initiate enrollment in a course. Handles both free courses (instant enrollment) and paid courses (Paystack payment).

courseId.description: ID of the course to enroll in

400.description: Bad request - Invalid course ID or already enrolled

post.description: Handles Paystack payment confirmation webhooks. This endpoint is called by Paystack when payment status changes.

400.description: Bad request - Missing or invalid signature

get.description: Check if the authenticated user is enrolled in a specific course.

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: ID of the course to check enrollment for

get.description: Retrieve all courses the authenticated user is enrolled in.

post.description: Update user's profile picture
Create a new notification to send to students. Facilitator access required.

recipient_type.description: Type of recipients for the notification

course_id.description: Course ID (required if recipient_type is COURSE_STUDENTS)

recipient_id.description: Specific student ID (required if recipient_type is SPECIFIC_STUDENT)

get.description: Retrieve notifications for the authenticated user with pagination support.

parameters.name: unread_only
parameters.description: Filter to show only unread notifications

put.description: Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user.

200.description: All notifications marked as read successfully

put.description: Mark a specific notification as read for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: ID of the notification to mark as read

delete.description: Delete a notification. Facilitators can delete any notification they created, users can delete their own notification records.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: ID of the notification to delete
